title: Bug 114470: Error message throws when using new Date("3/2/2005") as value in table filter.
OB: When using the value new Date("3/2/2005") in a table filter, an error message is thrown.
EB: The value new Date("3/2/2005") should be accepted and used as a valid input for the table filter without throwing an error message.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a datasource and a dataset containing a datetime column.
2. Insert a table and create a filter based on the datetime column.
3. Input the value new Date("...") as the filter value, for example new Date("3/2/2005").
